<!-- matrix-2 -->

What kind of mathematical object will the following produce?

$$\left(\begin{array}{r} 
8 & 4 & 8 \\ 
4 & 2 & 7 \\ 
3 & 8 & 2 \\ 
6 & 5 & -8 \\ 
\end{array}\right) \times 
\left(\begin{array}{r} 
-1 & 2 & -4\\ 
0 & 0 & 9\\ 
-5 & 3 & 8 \\ 
4 & 1 & 1\\ 
\end{array}\right)$$

```{mcq}
#| label: mcq-matrix-3
#| inline: true
1. A scalar 
2. A column vector
3. A row vector
4. A matrix with three columns [correct]
5. A matrix with three rows
6. It's meaningless. 
```
